scripts.start: npx cross-env ENV=production MAX_WORKERS=7 node dist/index.uws.js
scripts.start:pm2: npx cross-env ENV=production MAX_WORKERS=7 CLUSTER_INSTANCES=1 npm run pm2-puppeteer-ssr:uws
scripts.dev: npx cross-env PORT=9090 ENV=developer MAX_WORKERS=7 node -r sucrase/register src/index.ts
scripts.dev:fastify: npx cross-env PORT=9090 ENV=developer MAX_WORKERS=7 node -r sucrase/register src/index.fastify.ts
scripts.dev:uws: npx cross-env PORT=9090 ENV=developer MAX_WORKERS=7 node -r sucrase/register src/index.uws.ts
scripts.preview: npx cross-env ENV=production ENABLE_CONSOLE_DEBUGGER=true MAX_WORKERS=7 node dist/index.uws.js
